name: Place an Iron, Gold and Diamond block on top of each other
2 Creepers in the same Boat
tooltip: The 2 Creepers must be in the same boat at the same time

name: Kill yourself with your own arrow
Rotten Flesh, Spider Eye, Bone, Gunpowder and Ender Pearl
3 Different Seeds
tooltip: Includes: Beetroot Seeds, Melon Seeds, Nether Wart, Pumpkin Seeds and (Wheat) Seeds. As per the 'A Seedy Place' advancement.

name: Add a Marker to a Map
Kill a hostile mob with Gravel/Sand
Hang a mob with a lead
tooltip: Suspend a mob in mid air using a fence and a lead

name: Activate a 6x5 Nether Portal (not counting corners)
tooltip: Width/height of the obsidian frame, disregarding corners (or in other words, width/height of the - once activated - purple portal area).
